summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lot 1, Block 1, Bob's Addition; a portion of Tract 14, Ravenna Springs Park; Lots 46, 47 and 48, Block 1, Supplemental Plat of McGuire & Holden's Addition to Latona; Lots 1 to 4, Block 74, Denny & Hoyt's Addition; and a portion of the northwest quarter of the northeast quarter of the southeast quarter of Section 1-25-3, W. M., with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-202 and 17-149, respectively.
